fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Trans-European Networks, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives: Legislative initiatives regarding education and human rights. Specific legislative initiatives regarding religions.
section: V - Organisations representing churches and religious communities
subsection: Organisations representing churches and religious communities
position: Secretary General of the Holy Synod
goals__remit: For our main mission, we have taken care of the Bulgarian diaspora, especially the one on the territory of the European Union. We are doing this by serving liturgies, as well as perform other activities related to the life of our diaspora and our church.
